definition: to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: Confucius regarded the talent thought as the important part of his political system.
sentences.chinese: 人才思想是孔子政治思想體系的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: In Liang's Calligraphy knowledge system, practice was the most important thing.
sentences.chinese: 梁同書的書學思想體系中，實踐最爲重要。

sentences.english: Yan Wenliang the pure fine arts and the practical fine arts pay equal attention to education ideology.
sentences.chinese: 顏文梁純粹美術與實用美術並重的教育思想體系。

sentences.english: Wang Kai Yun' Poetics is classical and different from the common custom poetics.
sentences.chinese: 湘綺詩學是一個與世俗詩學不同的古典詩學思想體系。

sentences.english: German philosopher Gadamer's known by his philosophical hermeneutics of ideology.
sentences.chinese: 德國哲學家伽達默爾以其哲學闡釋學的思想體系著稱。

sentences.english: Secondly, I will discuss the role and value of Anti-Fatalism in Mozi's ideology.
sentences.chinese: 接著，探討非命在墨翟思想體系具有的地位與價值。

sentences.english: Chapter two deducts the whole logic system of the Ho-shang Kung Commentaries on the Lao Tzu.
sentences.chinese: 第二章展開《河上公注》思想體系的邏輯推衍全過程。

sentences.english: Three aspects unified, constituted the Confucianist person study ideology.
sentences.chinese: 三方面結合，構成了儒家人學思想體系。

sentences.english: The talent thought was regarded as the important part of Confucian political system.
sentences.chinese: 人才思想是孔子政治思想體系的重要組成部分。

definition: variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
